content.en: Underwater target tracking: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve the tracking of mobile targets in underwater environments. These algorithms, such as the Kalman Filter, Extended Kalman Filter, and Particle Filter, are used to enhance tracking performance by balancing information contribution against cost, coping with uncertainties in target maneuvers, acquiring equivalent measurements, and improving fusion tracking. The goal is to develop more accurate and robust tracking systems for applications like underwater wireless sensor networks, UUV tracking, target motion analysis, and source localization.
content.da: Undervandsmålsporing: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre sporing af mobile mål i undervandsmiljøer. Disse algoritmer, såsom Kalman Filter, Extended Kalman Filter og Particle Filter, anvendes for at øge sporingsydelsen ved at balancere informationsbidrag mod omkostninger, håndtere usikkerheder i målets manøvrer, opnå tilsvarende målinger og forbedre fusion sporing. Målet er at udvikle mere nøjagtige og robuste sporingssystemer til anvendelser som undervands trådløse sensornetværk, UUV sporing, måls bevægelsesanalyse og kildelokalisering.
